definition: how?/how about?/how was it?/how are things?
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc
not up to much/very indifferent/nothing great about it/nothing good to be said about it

sentences.english: How about tidying up a bit in the sitting-room ?
sentences.chinese: 把起居室稍微打掃一下怎麼樣？

sentences.english: What do you think about Union Square?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得聯合廣場怎麼樣？

sentences.english: What do you think about the two-party system in the United States?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲美國的兩黨制怎麼樣？
來一塊魚肉三明治怎麼樣？

sentences.english: Well, it all looks so good. How about ordering the steamed prawns?
sentences.chinese: 這兒的菜看着都不錯，我們要一份蒸蝦怎麼樣？

sentences.english: But at each point you know how you're doing.
sentences.chinese: 但是在每個點上你知道你做得怎麼樣。

sentences.english: What about the other athletics events?
sentences.chinese: 其他的田徑項目怎麼樣？

sentences.english: How about we go for hotpot dinner ?
Lady in the end how to be beautiful like?
sentences.chinese: 女人到底怎麼樣纔算美麗？

sentences.english: What about motorcycle V. S. car oils ???
sentences.chinese: 摩托車和汽車機油對比怎麼樣？

sentences.english: But what if gender discrimination is in fact happening?
sentences.chinese: 但要是真的有性別歧視存在又會怎麼樣呢？

sentences.english: But what about bugs no bigger than the raindrops themselves?
sentences.chinese: 但是比雨點還小的小蟲子們，它們的情況怎麼樣呢？

sentences.english: Your Homestay should also give you a map and tell you how to get to the college.
sentences.chinese: 寄宿家庭也會給你一張地圖並告訴你怎麼樣去學校。

sentences.english: How to test the invitation code to get ah?
sentences.chinese: 怎麼樣才能獲得測試的邀請碼啊？

sentences.english: M: What do you think of the questionnaire report?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得這份問卷調查報告怎麼樣？

sentences.english: Yes I am a Prolem child, but what fuck can you do to me about?
sentences.chinese: 對，我是個問題兒童，但是你能那我怎麼樣？

definition: (posing a question: whether sb, something) can or cannot?/is able to or not
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
